page.title: 01General Review of the Block
page.content: The land between Eaton Constantine and Wroxeter is mainly farmland with crops and grass.There are two villages and three small groups of houses. There is only one main road which is the B4380.The other roads are narrow and some barely wide enough for one car. {EATON CONSTANTINE The village is built alongside the road. There are a few black and white buildings and a couple of new houses. There are also two farms but no shops. {WROXETER Wroxeter is a village built near the remains of a roman city. It has houses of all ages and is the only village in our block that has a shop. {CHARLTON HILL Charlton Hill is 470 feet high with a farm and a few houses over looking the countryside for miles around.
